index.html.erb

Path: app/views/model_browser/index.html.erb
Last Update: Wed Jul 16 11:35:16 +0200 2008

<%

begin

This view renders the index-display for a model-class (controller-action index).

It simply uses the partials +model_browser/filter+ and +model_browser/index+ to provide a filterable list of all model-instances.

Pagination via will_paginate is supported to cope with large result-sets.

The following members must be provided by the calling controller:

@model_class:the model-class, for which the list shall be displayed
@model_instances:an array with the model-objects to display

end

%>

<% 

  filter_attributes ||= @model_class.filter_attributes || @model_class.primary_key

%> <h1>Index of <%=@model_class.table_name.upcase%> - <%=@model_class.display_name%></h1> <%= render :partial => "model_browser/filter", :locals => { 

    :filter_attributes => filter_attributes

} %> <p/> <%= render :partial => "model_browser/index", :locals => { 

    :heading_tag => :none,
    :entry_class => @model_class,
    :entries => @model_instances

} %> <%= will_paginate @model_instances %>

[Validate]
